phrase.item: Oh dear Wakhan, Wakhan, I miss [you].
I dream of seeing you, I miss [you].
Your mountains and waterfalls, and [your] cool riverbanks.
Darshay, Wedit, and Shetkharv, I miss [them].
Cold water is in your water channels.
Your garden and field, your spring is so hot.
Vichkut, Yamchun, and Shirgin, I miss [them].
Your [keshket] and basket, mountain goat and lion.
Vunukt, Yamchun, and Vrang, I miss [them].
Your old and young people are in my heart.
Your oven and oven door, [wajtshet xetijung]
Langar, Asor, and Zung, I miss [them].
